title: gofix change for googlecode repository imports always chooses /p/, sometimes it should be /r/
body:
With the latest weekly, googlecode import paths were changed from
"x.googlecode.com/hg" to "code.google.com/p/x". However, sometimes
it should be "code.google.com/r/x". This happens when the repository is a
clone.

For example, http://code.google.com/r/jasmuth-gocsv/ is a clone of
http://code.google.com/p/gocsv/, but gofix rewrote
"jasmuth-csv.googlecode.com/hg/csv" to
"code.google.com/r/jasmuth-gocsv/csv".
